name: Rules of Engagement: Book 2
storyline: Tricked into marriage?! Has your ex's deception ruined your chance at finding true love?
summary: Rules of Engagement, Book 2 is the second book of the Rules of Engagement series. It succeeds its first book, Rules of Engagement, Book 1, and is followed by Rules of Engagement, Book 3, and a spin-off, Rules of Engagement: Newlyweds.
